name: Telenet Group Holding NV
goal: Telenet specialises in the supply of broadband internet, fixed telephony services and cable television to customers throughout Flanders and a part of Brussels over a powerful HFC (hybrid fibre-coax) network.  It also offers mobile services on the entire territory of Belgium. In this respect it  acquired BASE, a mobile network operator. Telenet also supplies professional communication services to businesses in Belgium and Luxembourg. Liberty Global is the main shareholder of Telenet.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
- Digital Agenda
- Digital Single Market
- Copyright reform
- Data Protection
- e-Privacy
- e-Commerce
- Universal service
- State Aid
- Radio Spectrum Policy Programme
- Data Retention
- ICT Research and Development
